special_text:
Protection from tokens
[+1]: Each player may draw a card. For each opponent that does, you gain 1 life and create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.
[-2]: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create a token that’s a copy of a creature sacrificed this way.
[-7]: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes a 6/6 black Horror creature with trample, menace, and lifelink.
